product_name: Light My Fire GrandPa's FireFork - Package of 2
long_description: Gather the whole family around the fire and have fun roasting your favorite foods with Grandpa's FireForkTM. It attaches firmly to just about any branch and the curved points hold food firmly.
short_description: Gather the whole family around the fire and have fun roasting your favorite foods with Grandpa's FireForkTM. It attaches firmly to just about any branch and the curved points hold food firmly.
